column5: Hi! Our house is tucked away at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac and is 20 minute easy drive to Houston Intercontinental Airport. We have easy access to Kingwood's great greenbelts for walking and running. We are a busy family with two kids and three wonderful dogs, but our house is your house when you stay with us! You'll have your own private bedroom (upstairs) and a full bath (downstairs). A second private bedroom with an air mattress is available for larger parties.
